title: Rain World
notes: Steam shows Very Positive (94% of 65k). Metacritic metascore 74; blended to high‑80s/low‑90s.
raw_comment: 2D platform environmental survival game. 4 local players in Arena mode. Downpour DLC adds 4-player Jolly-co-op and Expeditions modes. 16 players with mod: “Myriad of Slugcats”. 🖥️ Shared screen.
